website_summaries.verdict: A first-rate corner bookcase that is intended for extended use.
pros: Fan-shaped shelves will help you make the most of a corner space
Hassle-free assembly ensures quick, seamless setup
Vintage-industrial style helps the bookshelf make a unique statement in any living space
cons: Bookcase's shelves may appear uneven and look like they are leaning at times

customer_reviews.title: Even better in person!
customer_reviews.text: This shelf looked great online and even better in person. I love the contrast of dark metal legs with lighter wood shelves. Though it's considered a corner shelf, I actually didn't put it in a corner. I enjoy the dimension it adds to the wall and my plants look awesome on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Saw

customer_reviews.title: I love it. The legs are metal and the wood ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The legs are metal and the wood isn’t real Wood but it’s good quality for the price it looks beautiful in my living room
customer_reviews.author: Tamar Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shelf, Bad instructions and pieces
customer_reviews.text: Once fully put together, this shelf is worth the money and is very beautiful. My complaint is there are obvious mistakes in the instructions, such as putting shelf B where C should be. Also, pieces F are ever-so slightly angled and must be placed in the proper direction. How do you know which direction? Trial and error. The instructions show arrows pointing to a direction but forget to show the angle on the reinforcement. Another complaint is that some of the shelves are not fully drilled out where the screw nuts go. You won't realize this until it gets stuck and the screws won't go in.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Nice little shelf perfect for a corner, or as accent to main shelf
customer_reviews.text: These 2 ladder bookshelves are perfect for the space. Not too big, not too small. The color coordinates perfectly with the rest of our furniture. Adding the corner shelf to the regular shelf added a more finished look!
customer_reviews.author: Lynda T.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and attractive.  I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and attractive. I love it. Arrived with manufacturer box inside of a shipping box for extra care. Easy to assemble. 6 leg pieces are labeled with letter on the clear plastic sleeve. If you remove the sleeves before looking at instructions you will not easily know which leg piece is which. In my case, the sleeves came off 2 legs as I shook them out of the box. Use caution in unpacking as I also caused 2 wood pieces to fall out onto one another (totally my fault).
customer_reviews.author: DougEE

customer_reviews.title: Nice corner shelving
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this corner shelf for our small dining room area which leads to an outdoor deck. It holds a small lamp up top, my plants and dog leashes. It almost matches my dining table but if you don’t look too close it looks identical. The only reason I put 3 stars for sturdiness is that it sits on carpet and can easily be moved or swayed. It’s much nicer than others I ed looked at but think it could be valued a little less. It’s still a really nice piece and may order another for our living room.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Shelf
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister for her birthday and she loves it! I gave it to her unassembled and she said it was easy to put together and she did it by herself. It looks very stylish in the corner of her dining area and appears to be good quality. She is using it for a plant stand and it works great for that purpose. I would recommend this to anyone looking for corner storage or decor.
customer_reviews.author: Asphaltgirl

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: Arrived too late. There was no assembly instructions in the box and there wasn’t any short metal stick which shown in pics. I tried to assemble without help and I can’t say it was the best experience. It’s not sturdy enough -since I received it without some necessary material but it’s ok as long as I don’t put anything heavy on it. I won’t be returning it since it’s a lot of work for me now but I wouldn’t buy again from this brand. Not professional.
customer_reviews.author: Lr

customer_reviews.title: Decent looking shelf, but missing parts and won't sit evenly without them, and directions are off.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these. Both boxes were missing part "M", which is absolutely necessary for balancing this thing to make it sit flat. Not sure why it is even needed. - It should all measure up and sit flat and correctly without needing that part. Directions for top shelf indicated we should use the short screws, but that was wrong; not even possible for that to work. Had to use the long ones.
customer_reviews.author: Tina O.

customer_reviews.title: The product was missing assembly parts upon delivery.
customer_reviews.text: The table looks cool on the site, but the box was delivered on 8/15 without instructions or screws. It is now 8/29/20 and I'm still waiting for the manufacturer to send me the missing parts. At this time, I don't know anything about the product since the issue stems from poor delivery and packaging. While a return or exchange would have made sense, I am still waiting for their second attempt at delivering screws and assembly instructions. Not a good experience at all and I doubt it will change as long as I have pieces of a corner table laying on the floor collecting dust. BAD BAD BAD
customer_reviews.author: Jose Trana

customer_reviews.title: Looks great when put together, but not very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: This shelf looks great once put together, but it was not very easy to put together. The stickers on the packaging did not match the booklet on two pieces. The variety of lettering to differentiate the pieces was not enough. I had to dissemble it half way through to swap two pieces. They were labeled the same letter, but clearly need to go on one side versus the other to make everything line up properly. Once together though, it looks really nice. It is very sturdy and I have no fear of in toppling forward or falling apart. So, if you don't mind a bit of a challenge in the assembly department, then I would recommend this shelf.
customer_reviews.author: H. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Marked as delivered but only received 1 of 2 items of my order
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an entryway cabinet as well as this corner shelf. I only received the cabinet but both items were marked as delivered. I've left messages with both FedEx and Songmics and am waiting for a resolution to this problem. I really like this line of products but I suggest you order them separately
customer_reviews.author: Donna M.

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth it, Even with Assembly Problems.
customer_reviews.text: Although I love this, the assembly was complicated. Not only do you need 2 people, but the holes in all of the shelves were not drilled out properly. Fortunately my husband had the needed tools to bore the holes properly. It fits perfect in my corner and holds 2 Instant Pits, all the accessories and on top I have a diffuser. I would have given it 5 stars if it hadn’t been all the assembly problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality, and sturdy enough when the bolts are tightened. An Allen wrench is included, but you also need a small flat or Phillips head screwdriver to hold the threaed inserts in the correct position when bolting. If you do not, the inserts tend to twist causing the bolt to jam, cross-thread. Likely the reason for the assembly issues cited by other reviewers.
customer_reviews.author: Nona

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Plant stand
customer_reviews.text: It seems very sturdy although it comes with wall mounts that we chose not to use since you’d have to drill holes in the wall. I’m conscious about keeping the plants pushed to the back just in case. As you can see, the plant stand is the perfect size and doesn’t stick out into the room to become a trip hazard. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Cebula

customer_reviews.title: Nice little corner shelf for my daughter's room
customer_reviews.text: Like anything it's a bit annoying to put these things together and there's a plethora of cardboard and Styrofoam to deal with, but that stands to reason so it comes undamaged. It had a few holes that didn't quite line up and I had to strategically piece it together to force it, but it wasn't the most egregious piece of furniture I've had to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Risto

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This corner piece was exactly what I was looking for. A few tiers of different sizes in a semi dark wood tone with black accent. It goes with my bathroom vibe perfectly. The piece is not too big and not too tall either. The assembly also did not take me more than 30 minutes to do.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Great Look and Quality
customer_reviews.text: This shelf set was easy to assemble and looked exactly like the photo once finished. I will say it wasn't as tall as I expected it to be but still great. Also love that it came with the wall anchors. If you have animals or children those are necessary upon installation as the shelf itself is not very heavy so it can be knocked over quite easily.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Waller

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price point
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bookshelf for a corner in my office. Pros: - easy to assemble - color looks great -feels sturdy Cons: - the shelves are small. Make sure to read the dimensions to ensure it will meet your needs. Now that I have it I wish I had a little more shelf space. - a bit wobbly
customer_reviews.author: Jessica W.

customer_reviews.title: Parts did not line up right, not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box, I was surprised at how nice everything looked- the wood looked beautiful, the legs were a sleek black metal. I was excited to see it all assembled. However, once I began assembling, it was clear things were not going to be as great as I’d hoped. The pieces wouldn’t line up correctly, leaving me with an oddly assembled shelf and some gaps between the legs. Thankfully it sits against a corner so you can’t tell unless you get close, but I’m still annoyed I spent more than $30 on this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Saylor

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Ignore the reviews that say this shelf is difficult to assemble. I had this thing standing in 10 minutes. Super easy! Great quality too. The “wood” is gorgeous! I also like that the legs are matte metal.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: This little shelf finished up our bathroom quite nicely. We put a few candles and books on it and it looks great. It took about 10 minutes to assemble and the quality is much better than I had expected.
customer_reviews.author: theresa martin

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shelf
customer_reviews.text: Overall great shelf for our living room corner. So easy to put together and didnt seem like a cheap shelf like you may expect from some each to assembly pieces. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So frustrated with the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Three of the threads for the screws didn’t work, got halfway through and had to take everything back together and send it back. Made in China....speaks for itself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is just what that small area needed. Many reviews said they had a hard time assembling, I did not find tha,t true. I did it myself
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful corner shelf! Looks great with my dark floors! Super easy to assemble and pretty sturdy!! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but be careful not waterproof wood
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Quite stable. However, the wood is not waterproof. I put a pot plant on the upper level with a thick tissue to prevent water leaking. Unfortunately, the tissue is wet, after two days, the edge is broken a bit as it absorbed the water.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BRAND
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this brand and their products. They are PERFECT for when you're renting an apartment. It fits perfectly in the corner of my small (600 sq ft) apt. I love the look of the piece as well, my first purchase was the shoe rack (which i actually use as a side table by my bed and its great), then that lead to the vintage TV stand and corner shelf unit. I'm about to buy the coffee table too! The pieces are all so simple to put together and they are very sturdy. Nicely priced, not a piece of junk, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: This product was a complete piece of crap. Pieces did not fit together well, instruction booklet was incorrect, and after finally completing the shelf, it was totally unstable. 10/10 would NOT recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K.

customer_reviews.title: Goes with my rustic decor
customer_reviews.text: Got it on sale, very happy for what i got it for and what i would have paid for something similar elsewhere. I put it together myself and could have went a little faster with a helper. Directions are basic diagrams so it takes a few min to figure things out. I had a screw that wasn’t working right...they had an extra bag with a couple extra parts for back up! Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: The manufacturer installed the cap the accepts the screw for the upper shelf in the wrong end of one of the upper arms labeled ‘H’. It took a trip to the hardware store for a small metal file to smooth down the rough edge after pounding out the piece. It went together after that but the upper end now doesn’t have the part to accept the top shelf screw and the shelf floats up a 1/4 inch or so. Photo. Shoddy quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Great Shelves!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my plants and it was a little smaller than I had hoped but I was able to remove one of the shelves and it works great. It was very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Cute shelf but...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shelf. It looks great in the spot I bought it for. When it arrived, one of the attachments was missing. I called the company and they were very nice and shipped it out right away. Unfortunately, they only sent part of the attachments and I had to make another call and leave a message. This product would have gotten a higher rating if I hadn’t had to wait so long to put it together!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie R. Holliday

customer_reviews.title: Nice corner shelving unit
customer_reviews.text: I put it together myself. The instructions were very clear. It’s fairly sturdy but I didn’t find it as balanced so it’s good that it fits into that wall space. Not a bad value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Jamaican

customer_reviews.title: CROOKED AND POOR CRAFTSMANSHIP
customer_reviews.text: I put it all together and after double and triple checking the instructions and making sure I did it all right, the whole shelf sat crooked. It was so bad that it would barely stand up. I got out my tape measure and the two legs that were supposed to be the same length were about an inch off in length.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Peacock

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: These are a little expensive, but they're very high quality. They look AMAZING in our apartment and they were well worth the money. Thick, heavy materials. I'm displaying bar glasses, and I am confident this wont fall over and damage my items
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: 4 hands needed!
customer_reviews.text: Not meant to be installed alone. I was determined and got it done but it was hassle (a few screams of frustration that’s for sure). It’s pretty sturdy and looks nice. Money well spent. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Seattle SunChaser

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Had a little difficulty assembling and had to take apart and redo a leg. But once that was done it turned out great. Love it and love how it can with straps for the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I am out of "return window" by 2 days, but was not able to assemble this until now. The bottom shelf and upright are stripped and will not tighten. Also, the shelf has a huge gash on one side, but I was able to flip it over so that wouldn't show, but now that won't work because the screw won't tighten. Ugh
customer_reviews.author: BS

customer_reviews.title: Great shelf, bad instructions
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shelf. Great quality. Would purchase again. Only thing I didn't like was the tiny picture instructions with no written words made it a little more difficult to assemble but other than I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Williams

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but tips easily
customer_reviews.text: I have this in the corner with a light plant on top, a salt lamp in the middle and some game cases on the bottom. One night the whole thing fell over and dirt went everywhere. Use the extra straps to secure it....
customer_reviews.author: Collin Pattan

customer_reviews.title: Corner Rack for Plants
customer_reviews.text: I went on Amazon to look for a corner baker's rack for my plants. I wanted a rack that would fit in my corner space, would blend with my dark wood dining room table, and that was not expensive. The VASAGLE Corner Shelf was perfect. It was not expensive, easy to assemble, and blended well with my decor. The rack is not as tall as a baker rack or deep; but it fit perfect in my kitchen. I am so pleased with this product that I intend to order more products for a three-piece group to place in my home office.
customer_reviews.author: R Russell

customer_reviews.title: BUY
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute and easy to assemble ! Great to hide cables behind for WiFi and decorate with pictures and decor items
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Industrial look
customer_reviews.text: This product is so beautiful in our home! To be honest I hated it at first because of the industrial look but once I decorated it, I love it! It was a little difficult to put together on my own and I needed the help of my husband to hold some pieces together but once the top and bottom is secured the rest is no problem to handle on your own. The product is pretty sturdy but if it was put through a lot or bumped into often it may not hold up as well
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It is just what I was looking for. I really like the look of it!
customer_reviews.author: Yulia Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect in my corner . Not cheap looking. Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Stola

customer_reviews.title: Poor assembly quality, but great looking.
customer_reviews.text: Threads were not smooth and the cheap wood broke trying to screw the fittings in. Glad it was on the under side of the shelf. Not impressed with the quality. Looks great though.
customer_reviews.author: Joey M

customer_reviews.title: Works great for where we needed it.
customer_reviews.text: This looks fantastic under my mother’s tv that hangs from the wall. Looks good in the corner next to her table.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Economical
customer_reviews.text: I'm using it as a stand for my modem/router and DirecTV router. Fits compactly against the corner. Used the tie downs to keep it from tipping away from the wall. Great for my use.
customer_reviews.author: Goffer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Looks really nice. I suggest that they make it more obvious in the instructions that two of the poles have the slanted top. I almost missed that when putting it together. Otherwise great piece.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shelves!! Perfect for the corner of a room!! Shelves are wood, supports are metal. Pretty easy to assemble, would have been a lot easier with 2 people!
customer_reviews.author: Kris Buffalo

customer_reviews.title: Love this corner shelf!
customer_reviews.text: I am incredibly happy with this corner shelf! The shelves are a bit small and don’t hold much, but it’s really perfect for our nursery. It was easy to put together. I like that it’s metal with the wooden shelves. Looks really nice and feels sturdy. Great product for a good price!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Spaulding

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Best selection for a corner shelf! Very sturdy and easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Tlynn1222

customer_reviews.title: Be ready for missing parts and confusing instructions
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this will do. It looks good but some parts were missing (screws were missing) and the instructions are not very helpful. But some thinking and strong-will helped. We made it work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Prefect
customer_reviews.text: This is the finishing touch to my office and displaying all sorts of items.
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: Nice accent bookcase
customer_reviews.text: We finally finished our main hall/entryway decor and I bought this as an accent bookcase at the end. It looks really nice and displays my favorite books, pictures, and trinkets. Not a whole lot of storage room, but that's not really what I purchased it for anyways. Also has a system to anchor it to the corner/wall, which is nice with a dog and 3 year old in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I bought this corner shelf and I plant to buy the matching bookshelf. Looks beautiful, and was relatively easy to assemble - simple instructions but some awkward angles. All in all I would buy this again
customer_reviews.author: kab

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect corner shelf! Beautiful shelves with metal support posts. Very nice product!
customer_reviews.author: Brook A Rohrbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Not loving it
customer_reviews.text: I got the middle one and decided to go for the corner shelf because it was on a lightning deal. Still not happy with it. Not very sturdy. Very small.
customer_reviews.author: J&L

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, looks great in a corner. Sturdy and looks nice. Can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisp

customer_reviews.title: Good under wall mounted TV
customer_reviews.text: Nice stand that you can put decorations on under a wall mounted TV.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Put it together alone. Quick and cute. Perfect for the corner space I needed to fill.
customer_reviews.author: jaimie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to assemble and fits perfectly for what I wanted it for. Also, the seller was fantastic! They reached out to me to make sure everything went smoothly and followed up with me to ensure all is good. Very professional and polite.
customer_reviews.author: A. Razek

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Impressed by how solid this is. It was made very well.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectation
customer_reviews.text: Wow, after reading some of the comments I must admit I wasn't certain I made the right choice on purchasing this item. Once I received the corner shelf, I was pleased with the quality and easy to assemble parts. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shelf!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not so easy to assemble but definitely worth it! I love this shelf for our half bath!
customer_reviews.author: meg

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Little tricky to put together. Follow directions CAREFULLY. Now that it’s assembled, I love it. Looks great, nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Quick assembly. Sturdy. Looks great. A bit short. But does the trick
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Fields

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good in the Corner!
customer_reviews.text: I get a lot of compliments on this. I have it setup in the corner of my bedroom and it looks and functions great. I have it decorated nicely. The product is sturdy and looks quality. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: A James

customer_reviews.title: Love it - but I need 2 more hands
customer_reviews.text: I really love this shelf for my small apartment. The only thing I didn’t like was putting it together. Probably didn’t help that I was tired and just really badly wanted it to be done. But a second set of hands probably would have helped me. Other than that - I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Hillary A.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is a corner unit and looks very rich.
customer_reviews.author: Kathyaqualover

customer_reviews.title: Not bad. Made in China though :-(
customer_reviews.text: PITA to assemble! But once you’re done struggling for 2 hours it’s not a bad piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Better product than I expected! I was looking for something simple to fill a corner behind my sectional sofa, but not wanting to spend a fortune for something that was going to be (for the most part) concealed. This worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Keith Wernsman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for that Industial look and to fill a corner
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! It matched my entertainment center perfectly. Was easy to put together and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Y.

customer_reviews.title: Parts missing!
customer_reviews.text: Parts were missing from the box. Since it would have been expensive to return and would have meant standing in the post office line DURING a PANDEMIC, I chose to swallow the cost.
customer_reviews.author: So Many Books...

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great stand! I was skeptical for the good price and getting it from China but man this is well made and looks great. I do recommend having a second person, makes it so much easier putting together. If you need extra storage like when you lady has multiple picture frames I say go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice. Used it to hold my heavy rock and crystal collection. Great quality and good price.
customer_reviews.author: jdw

customer_reviews.title: Lovely corner unit, well designed.
customer_reviews.text: Nice mid size corner unit. Just the right size to display a few items i enjoy. Is not an eye drawing item so shows off whats on it.
customer_reviews.author: scott mills

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Cheap & Easy
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price!! Easy to assemble, came with everything you needed to assemble. Looks expensive!!
customer_reviews.author: sms09

customer_reviews.title: Nice corner shelf
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for a nice shelf that’s not too big or small this is it. It has a nice color and sits well on the corner. If you have children keep an eye out, as it leans forward with a slight strong tug.
customer_reviews.author: Yesi

customer_reviews.title: Highly satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely piece, easy to put together, perfect size and very convenient to use.
customer_reviews.author: TheSolution

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Setup took a minute but for the most part it’s a straight forward setup. Will add character to whatever room you add to.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: This shelf is tiny! Look at the dimensions before you order. Don't make the same mistake I did! Also it was very easy to assemble because I'm not inept like the other reviewers. Plus I had all the parts + the spare they included.
customer_reviews.author: Nataliee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love this bookshelf. It's not the sturdiest, does wobble a bit, however it's absolutely gorgeous so I don't mind at all.
customer_reviews.author: L H

customer_reviews.title: Great Sturdy Shelf
customer_reviews.text: The shelf was much larger than I expected. It seems to be really sturdy and it fits in the corner perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: tyneka m

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful wood. Looks great in the corner. Definitely worth the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and looks classy. It is not as tall as I expected but I did not read the description 🤣😂 it's still pretty tall though.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product! The instructions say to assemble it with two people, but honestly you'd have to be stunad, you can assemble it yourself and it fits perfectly in the corner of the room. GREAT purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: So glad we picked this one. It is very sturdy and just what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Pam O.

customer_reviews.title: Great corner shelf! Perfect fit and matches my table
customer_reviews.text: I wanted more surface space and shelves in my kitchen, and this works perfectly. It was pretty easy to assemble, but towards the end, I had my roommate help. It looks great and matches the look of my kitchen table.
customer_reviews.author: KParr

customer_reviews.title: Short shelf, good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This shelf has a nice look, but it's pretty short. The first one I bought had a defect and couldn't be put together, but SONGMICS customer service responded promptly and sent me a replacement. I'd say this is more of a display shelf than a shelf you want to load up with things you really need to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Poor instructions with mislabeled pieces. Good material and sturdy furniture. Overall very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little shelf!!
customer_reviews.text: This was amazingly easy to assemble despite the instructions recommending "two" people to assemble! I did it and in no time at all!!! It looks great in the corner of my bedroom as I opted to double it as a nightstand/shelf. PERFECT little jewel:)
customer_reviews.author: Corliss

customer_reviews.title: So cute!!
customer_reviews.text: Looooovvvveeee this shelf! I bought the matching latter shelf as well and they are my favorite pieces in my living room! BUY THEM!
customer_reviews.author: Madie

customer_reviews.title: Great look
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. It didnt require a lot of assembly and it looks good . It took me like 20 min to put it together by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Marie smith

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: DEFINITELY need 2 people to assemble! It’s not difficult at all, it’s just a handful! The sturdiness is more than okay, but not GREAT. All in all, I’m in LOVE and it’s the perfect fit for our home! AMAZING value for price!
customer_reviews.author: Arin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shelf. Especially for the price. I was hoping it was a little taller but that is just a personal preference. Looks great for decorating!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice little shelf
customer_reviews.text: This looks much better in my bathroom than the wire rack before. The only problem was it was a hard to screw in the top platform, but the key was to only screw in each screw a little at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little shelving unit for the price. Very easy to assemble and is quite sturdy. Arrived in perfect condition
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Strasser

customer_reviews.title: Make sure the top pieces are angled correctly or you'll have to take apart and redo.
customer_reviews.text: My shipment got here sooner than expected. Was easy to put together. Looks nice! I'm using it for a couple plants and decorations 😊 I think I will order a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Brown

product_meta.title: VASAGLE Industrial Corner Shelf, 4-Tier Bookcase, Storage Rack, Plant Stand for Home Office, Wood Look Accent Furniture with Metal Frame, Rustic Brown ULLS34X
feature_bullets: BUILT FOR EXTENDED USE: Sturdy metal for the frame and durable chipboard for shelving, this corner ladder bookcase has long service life
4-TIER OPEN SHELVES: Fan-shaped shelves provide ample space while making full use of the corner space, perfect for storing any items you want to collect and display

STABLE FOR SAFE USE: Stable three-legged structure; 3 protective caps on the bottom, one is adjustable to ensure this corner shelf organizer stands stably on uneven surfaces and fits well to the wall; comes with anti-toppling fittings to anchor it to the wall for safe use

NO HASSLE ASSEMBLY: Corner ladder shelf vintage comes with detailed and illustrated instructions and numbered parts; all fittings and tools required for assembly are included for a worry-free assembly

VINTAGE INDUSTRIAL STYLE: Matte black frame combined with vintage shelving, this corner shelf unit is sophisticated and stylish, matches well with your other furniture; sized 13. 4”L x 13. 4”W x 49. 2”H (34 x 34 x 125 cm)
